technical-data.invention-title: Bearing with a shape memory alloy component
Palier avec un composant en alliage à mémoire de forme

description.p: The method and apparatus of the present application relates to a bearing. The bearing can be used on a helicopter, for example.

Certain bearings, such as elastomeric bearings, use alternating layers of metal shims and layers of elastomeric material. Such a bearing is for example known from EP 0456 384 A1, which is considered being the closest prior art showing the features of the preamble of claims 1 and 2. During fabrication of the bearing, considerable effort is made to install the layers elastomeric material so that each layer is in precompression. In some bearings, a lower grade of elastomeric material so that the elastomeric portions can be squeezed into the bearing geometry.
Hence, there is a need for an improved bearing, and method of manufacturing the bearing.

The novel features believed characteristic of the method and apparatus of the present application are set forth in the appended claims. However, the method and apparatus itself, as well as a preferred mode of use, and further objectives and advantages thereof, will best be understood by reference to the following detailed description when read in conjunction with the accompanying drawings, wherein:
Figure 1 is a front view of a bearing assembly, according to an illustrative embodiment of the present application;
Figure 2 is a cross-sectional view of a the bearing assembly, taken at section lines 2-2 in Figure 1, according to the illustrative embodiment of the present application; and
Figure 3 is a schematic view of a method of manufacturing the bearing assembly, according to an illustrative embodiment of the present application.

Illustrative embodiments of the apparatus and method are described below. In the interest of clarity, all features of an actual implementation may not be described in this specification. It will of course be appreciated that in the development of any such actual embodiment, numerous implementation-specific decisions must be made to achieve the developer's specific goals, such as compliance with system-related and business-related constraints, which will vary from one implementation to another. Moreover, it will be appreciated that such a development effort might be complex and time-consuming but would nevertheless be a routine undertaking for those of ordinary skill in the art having the benefit of this disclosure.

In the specification, reference may be made to the spatial relationships between various components and to the spatial orientation of various aspects of components as the devices are depicted in the attached drawings. However, as will be recognized by those skilled in the art after a complete reading of the present application, the devices, members, apparatuses, etc. described herein may be positioned in any desired orientation. Thus, the use of terms such as "above," "below," "upper," "lower," or other like terms to describe a spatial relationship between various components or to describe the spatial orientation of aspects of such components should be understood to describe a relative relationship between the components or a spatial orientation of aspects of such components, respectively, as the device described herein may be oriented in any desired direction.

The apparatus of the present application includes a bearing having one or more elastomeric members in a precompression loading by a shim that includes a shape memory alloy. The shape memory alloy shim is configured to generate the precompression upon a temperature change. The method of the present application includes manufacturing a bearing by utilizing a shape memory alloy shim to apply a precompression to the elastomeric members.

Referring to Figures 1 and 2, an exemplary bearing assembly 101 is illustrated. Bearing assembly 101 can include a housing 103, a plurality of shims 105a-105c, a plurality of elastomeric members 107a-107d, and an inner bearing member 109. Each shim 105a-105c includes a shape memory alloy that is configured to produce a compression preload force upon the inwardly adjacent elastomeric member 107b-107d. For example, shim 105a imparts compression in elastomeric member 107b. Similarly, shim 105b imparts compression in elastomeric member 107c. Further, shim 105c imparts compression in elastomeric member 107d. The precompression force on the elastomeric members helps to extend its life by reducing indirect shear stress.

Each shim 105a-105c includes a shape memory alloy that causes the shims 105a-105c to constrict when subjected to an increase in temperature. Each shim 105a-105c is preferably in a cylindrical shape. However, bearing assembly 101 may include shims and elastomeric members of other shapes as well. Further, it should be appreciated that bearing assembly 101 may include any number shims and elastomeric members.

Referring to Figure 3, a method 301 of manufacturing bearing assembly 101 is schematically illustrated. In a step 303, the elastomeric members 107a-107d are preferably molded, but elastomeric members 107a-107d can be manufactured in accordance with other methods as well. Further in step 303, housing 103 and inner bearing member 109 are fabricated. Housing 103 and inner bearing member 109 preferably include a rigid metal material and may be manufactured in accordance with a variety of methods known in the art. Further in step 303, each shim 105a-105c is fabricated. Each shim 105a-105c preferably includes a shape memory alloy that causes the size and shape of the part to return to predetermined original shape when subjected to heat. As such, each shim 105a-105c is fabricated such that the ambient temperature size and shape is slightly smaller than the elastomeric member located inwardly adjacent. A variety of shape memory alloys, which are known in the art, are acceptable in the composition of shims 105a-105c. For example, a shape memory alloy containing a nickel/titanium alloy can be used in shims 105a-105c.

Method 301 continues with a step 305 which includes subjecting shims 105a-105c to a cold environment. A step 307 can include expanding each shim 105a-105c with a mandrel. The combination of the cold environment and expanding pressure from the mandrel causes the shims 105a-105c to expand.

Method 301 continues with a step 309 of assembling shims 105a-105c, elastomeric members 107a-107d, along with inner bearing member 109. Adhesive can be used to secure each shim with an adjacent elastomeric member. For example, elastomeric member 107d can be adhesively bonded to inner bearing member 109 and shim 105c. Similarly, elastomeric member 107c can be adhesively bonded to shim 105c and shim 105b. Further, elastomeric member 107b can be adhesively bonded to shim 105b and shim 105a.

Method 301 continues with a step 311 for allowing the shims to compress the elastomeric members. As the parts are allowed to warm, shims 105a-105c constrict due to the shape memory alloy material. As the shims 105a-105c constrict, the elastomeric members 107b-107d compress. Once the shims 105a-105c have fully constricted, the remaining elastomeric member 107a can be pressed and bonded into the gap between housing 103 and shim 105a. In some embodiments, heat can be applied to facilitate the return of shims 105a-105c to their original shape, thus applying a constricting force.

The method and apparatus of the present application provides significant advantages, including: 1) providing a more cost efficient manufacturing technique for generating precompression in the elastomeric members; 2) providing a method of manufacturing that enables a higher grade of elastomeric material to be used; and 3) providing more uniform precompression across the elastomeric members.

The particular embodiments disclosed above are illustrative only, as the method and apparatus may be modified and practiced in different but equivalent manners apparent to those skilled in the art having the benefit of the teachings herein. Modifications, additions, or omissions may be made to the method and apparatus described herein without departing from the scope of the invention. The components of the apparatus may be integrated or separated. The steps of the method may be integrated or separated. Moreover, the operations of the apparatus may be performed by more, fewer, or other components.

Furthermore, no limitations are intended to the details of construction or design herein shown, other than as described in the claims below. It is therefore evident that the particular embodiments disclosed above may be altered or modified and all such variations are considered within the scope of the application. Accordingly, the protection sought herein is as set forth in the claims below.

claim.claim-text: Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1, ferner aufweisend: eine Klebstoffschicht zwischen dem Zwischenlegering und dem elastomeren Element; oder Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 2, ferner eine Klebstoffschicht zwischen den einzelnen Zwischenlegeringen und elastomeren Elementen aufweisend; oder Verfahren nach Anspruch 3, ferner den Schritt des Aufbringens eines Klebstoff zwischen dem Zwischenlegering und dem elastomeren Element umfassend.

Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1 oder Anspruch 4, wobei der Zwischenlegering ungefähr zylindrisch geformt ist; oder
Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 2, wobei jedes elastomere Element und jedes Zwischenlegeringelement ungefähr zylindrisch geformt ist; oder
Verfahren nach Anspruch 3 oder Anspruch 4, wobei der Zwischenlegering ungefähr zylindrisch ist.
Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1 oder Anspruch 2 oder Anspruch 4 oder Anspruch 5, wobei das innere Lagerelement ungefähr zylindrisch geformt ist.

Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1 oder Anspruch 2 oder einem der Ansprüche 4 bis 6, wobei die Temperaturänderung ein Temperaturanstieg ist; oder
wobei der Zwischenlegering dafür ausgelegt ist, eine Druckkraft auf das elastomere Element auszuüben, wenn er einem Temperaturanstieg ausgesetzt wird; oder
Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 2, wobei die Zwischenlegeringe jeweils dafür ausgelegt sind, jeweilige elastomere Elemente einzuengen, wenn sie einem Temperaturanstieg ausgesetzt werden.
Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1 oder einem vorangehenden Lageranspruch, wobei die Legierung mit Formgedächtnis eine Nickel/Titan-Legierung beinhaltet.

Lageranordnung nach Anspruch 1 oder einem der Ansprüche 4 bis 8, wenn sie direkt oder indirekt von Anspruch 1 abhängen, ferner aufweisend: ein zusätzliches elastomeres Element, das zwischen dem Zwischenlegering und der Innenoberfläche des Gehäuses angeordnet ist.

Verfahren nach Anspruch 3 oder Anspruch 4 oder Anspruch 5 oder Anspruch 8, ferner den folgenden Schritt umfassend: Erweitern des Zwischenlegerings mit einem Dorn im Zusammenhang mit dem Schritt des Kühlens des Zwischenlegerings.
Verfahren nach Anspruch 3 oder einem vorangehenden Verfahrensanspruch, wobei der Zwischenlegering aus einer Legierung mit Formgedächtnis besteht.
Verfahren nach Anspruch 3 oder einem vorangehenden Verfahrensanspruch, wobei die Legierung mit Formgedächtnis eine Nickel/Titan-Legierung ist.

Verfahren nach Anspruch 3 oder einem vorangehenden Anspruch, wobei der Schritt des Bereitstellens des Zwischenlegerings und des elastomeren Elements die Bereitstellung des elastomere Elements in einer größeren Größe und Form als der Zwischenlegering umfasst.

A method of manufacturing a bearing assembly (101), the method comprising the steps of: providing an inner member (103), a housing (103), a shim (105), and an elastomeric member (107); cooling the shim (105); assembling the inner member (109), the housing (103), the shim (105) and the elastomeric member (107); and heating the shim (105), thereby causing the shim (105) to compress the elastomeric member (107).

The bearing assembly according to claim 1, further comprising: an adhesive layer between the shim and the elastomeric member; or the bearing assembly of claim 2 further comprising an adhesive layer between each shim and elastomeric member; or the method of claim 3 further comprising the step of applying an adhesive between the shim and the elastomeric member.

The bearing assembly according to claim 1 or of claim 4, wherein the shim is approximately cylindrically shaped; or
the bearing assembly of claim 2 wherein each elastomeric member and each shim member are approximately cylindrically shaped; or
the method of claim 3 or of claim 4, wherein the shim is approximately cylindrical.
The bearing assembly according to claim 1 or of claim 2 or of claim 4 or of claim 5, wherein the inner bearing member is approximately cylindrically shaped.

The bearing assembly according to claim 1 or of claim 2, or of any of claims 4 to 6, wherein the temperature changes is an increase in temperature; or
wherein the shim is configured to apply a compressive force on the elastomeric members when subjected to an increase in temperature; or
the bearing assembly of claim 2 wherein each shim is configured to constrict each elastomeric member when subjected to an increase in temperature.
The bearing assembly according to claim 1 or any preceding bearing claim, wherein the shape memory alloy includes a nickel/titanium alloy.

The bearing assembly according to claim 1 or of any of claims 4 to 8 as they depend directly or indirectly from claim 1, further comprising: an additional elastomeric member located between the shim and an inner surface of the housing.
The method according to claim 3 or of claim 4, or claim 5, or of claim 8, further comprising the step of: expanding the shim with a mandrel in conjunction with the step of cooling the shim.
The method according to claim 3 or any preceding method claim, wherein the shim is comprised of a shape memory alloy.
The method according to claim 3 or any preceding method claim, wherein the shape memory alloy is a nickel/titanium alloy.

The method according to claim 3 or any preceding method claim, wherein the step of providing the shim and the elastomeric member includes providing the elastomeric member at a larger size and shape than the shim.

Ensemble de palier (101) comprenant : un boîtier (103), un élément de support interne (109), un élément élastomère (107); une cale (105), caractérisé en ce que la cale (105) comprend un alliage à mémoire de forme qui est configuré pour appliquer une force de compression sur l'élément élastomère (107) lorsqu'il est soumis à une variation de température.

Ensemble de palier (101) comprenant : un boîtier (103), un élément de support interne (109), une pluralité d'éléments élastomères (1 07a-1 07d), une pluralité de cales (1 05a-1 05c), caractérisé en ce que chaque cale comprend un alliage à mémoire de forme.

Procédé de fabrication d'un ensemble de palier (101), le procédé comprenant les étapes consistant à : fournir un élément interne (109), un boîtier (103), une cale (105) et un élément élastomère (107), refroidir la cale (105), monter l'élément interne (109), le boîtier (103), la cale (105) et l'élément élastomère ; et chauffer la cale (105), provoquant ainsi la compression par la cale (105) de l'élément élastomère (107).

Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1, comprenant en outre : une couche adhésive entre la cale et l'élément élastomère, ou l'ensemble de palier selon la revendication 2 comprenant en outre une couche adhésive entre chaque cale et l'élément élastomère, ou le procédé selon la revendication 3, comprenant en outre l'étape consistant à appliquer un adhésif entre la cale et l'élément élastomère.

Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1 ou la revendication 4, dans lequel la cale est approximativement de forme cylindrique, ou
l'ensemble de palier selon la revendication 2, dans lequel chaque élément élastomère, et chaque élément de cale sont sensiblement de forme cylindrique, ou
le procédé selon la revendication 3 ou la revendication 4, dans lequel la cale est à peu près cylindrique.
Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1 ou la revendication 2 ou la revendication 4 ou la revendication 5, dans lequel l'élément de palier interne est approximativement cylindrique.

Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1 ou la revendication 2, ou selon l'une quelconque des revendications 4 à 6, dans lequel les changements de température sont des augmentations de la température, ou
dans lequel la cale est configurée pour appliquer une force de compression sur les éléments élastomères lors d'une élévation de température, ou
l'ensemble de palier selon la revendication 2, dans lequel chaque cale est configurée de manière à rétrécir chaque élément élastomère lorsqu'il est soumis à une élévation de température.
Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1 ou l'une quelconque des revendications précédentes de palier, dans lequel l'alliage à mémoire de forme comprend un alliage de nickel/titane.

Ensemble de palier selon la revendication 1 ou l'une quelconque des revendications 4 à 8 comme elles dépendent directement ou indirectement de la revendication 1, comprenant en outre : un élément en élastomère supplémentaire situé entre la cale et une surface interne du boîtier.

Procédé selon la revendication 3 ou la revendication 4, ou la revendication 5, ou selon la revendication 8, comprenant en outre l'étape consistant à : étendre la cale avec un mandrin en même temps que l'étape de refroidissement de la cale.
Procédé selon la revendication 3 ou l'une des revendications de procédé précédentes, dans lequel la cale est constituée d'un alliage à mémoire de forme.
Procédé selon la revendication 3 ou l'une des revendications de procédé précédentes, dans lequel l'alliage à mémoire de forme est un alliage de nickel/titane.

Procédé selon la revendication 3 ou l'une des revendications de procédé précédentes, dans lequel l'étape consistant à fournir la cale et l'élément en élastomère comprend la fourniture de l'élément élastomère de plus grande dimension et forme que la cale.
